title: I'm a gold III Support main (can off jg) - looking for a Gold+ team
body:
IGN: Freakin Out

Hi Guys,

I've been a main support for the last 3 years, but have also applied my craft to jungling as well for when required.

Last season in solo queue i was ranked Gold III, but i mainly enjoy focusing on ranked team games.

Last season i was apart of a Gold V, Gold III and Gold I team (We had three teams with a grouping of basically the same players), but this season it seems a lot of my team mates are no longer playing LoL, hence why I'm here looking for a new team!

To give you an idea of my attitude I've held all coloured ribbons each year for the last 3 years, so i am a positive player who rarely gets upset and remains supportive. I also watched a lot of LCS over the years, so can assist you with information on building a team comp/shot calling if required.

I also have a working mic.

Hope to hear from you soon.

replies.body:
ADC main gold 2

Working mic

IGN:ferguslad

Top/Jg/Adc mostly, Gold V atm, add me if interested

IGN: Jewish Boy

Mid Pirmary, ADC secondary... wouldn't mind joining a team :3 throw me an add if interested XD 

PS: I also have a working Mic

IGN: Kawaiisenpaidesu
